verbs.description: [ARG0: frequent data breaches] [V: make] [ARG1: it more difficult to verify taxpayers the irs fights to stay at least one step ahead of the fraudsters that use stolen taxpayer credentials to file tax returns] but the frequency of data breaches gives adversaries more ammunition gina garza rep mike bishop mike bishop baseball chief privacy officer internal revenue service irs edward killen rep rob bishop office of personnel management government accountability office chief information officer rep elijah cummings
